Nightlight/Windlord::


Nightlight woke up scared, her face was pale and  she was breathing. 
She changed to beast mode and walked out the room. She could heard 
Windlord used his comm link "Well Perplex... where're you?" 


Nightlight walked towards the ship's door she needed fresh air.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "That can't be good.  But I think we can handle him if he 
doesn't bring 
> reinforcements this time."  He picks up Gramps' head and hands it 
to 
> Windlord.  "I believe you needed this.  I'll go start with some 
primitive 
> defenses."  He runs out of the base.
